definition: to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.english: d. United Nations Special Rapporteur on the Right to Health, Mumbai, India.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國健康權特別報告員，印度孟買。

sentences.english: The Chinese side will study Tomasevski's opinions and suggestions regarding China's education in earnest.
sentences.chinese: 對於報告員提出的意見與建議，中方將認真予以研究。
